Check the 'Total' section displays 'Total:' with font weight 700 and the total value '€48.50' (including shipping) is color #000000
Ensure all monetary values use font family 'Lato'
Verify the cart has margin-top of 20px
Open the date picker
Verify the current date '2023-10-27' is selected with background color #007bff, text color #ffffff, and has border radius of 3px
Check that unselected dates have text color #666666 and background color #ffffff
Ensure the date picker calendar has width 300px and height 280px
Verify the 'Next Month' arrow has aria-label 'Next Month'
On the 'Terms & Conditions' page, verify the content area is scrollable, has height 400px, overflow-y 'scroll', contains exactly 5 paragraphs, and has left position of 20px
Scroll to the bottom of the content area
Verify scroll-top is at its maximum value
Scroll to the top of the content area
Verify scroll-top is 0
Check the scrollbar has background color #f1f1f1
Hover over the 'Help' icon

Verify a tooltip becomes visible within 200ms, displays text 'Click for assistance', has background color #333333, text color #ffffff, padding 8px 12px, border radius 4px, opacity 0.9, and its 'y' position is 10px below the 'Help' icon
When the mouse leaves the 'Help' icon, verify the tooltip becomes hidden with transition of 150ms

On the user profile page, verify the avatar image has source 'user_avatar.png', rendered dimensions 64x64px, shape 'circle' (border radius 50%), alt text 'User Profile Picture', is loaded successfully within 500ms, natural dimensions 200x200px, has 2px solid #ccc border, and its left position is 20px from the container edge
Initiate a file upload
Verify the progress bar element becomes visible
Confirm its inner bar has a width that dynamically updates from 0% to 100%, background color #28aa45, and height is 10px
Check the inner bar displays text '75% Complete' at 75% progress with text color #ffffff
Verify the outer bar has border radius 5px and the progress animation takes 2s to complete for full upload
Hover over the 'Settings' menu item on the sidebar menu
Verify its background color changes to #e9ecef within 150ms and its text color remains #212529
Confirm the 'Settings' menu item has padding 12px 20px, its text 'Settings' is left-aligned, maintains its 'left' position of 0px relative to the sidebar, and has aria-label 'Settings link'
At the bottom of the search results, verify there are 5 pagination buttons displayed, each with width 36px and height 36px
Confirm the 'Page 3' button is active, has background color #007bff, text color #ffffff, and 1px solid #007bff border
Check the 'Previous' button is enabled and the 'Next' button is also enabled
Verify inactive page buttons have background color #f8f9fa and text color #007bff
Click the 'Open Dialog' button
Verify the modal dialog becomes visible with opacity 1.0, has width 500px, height 300px, is centered on the screen (x 50%, y 50%), and has a fade-in animation duration of 300ms
Confirm its background overlay has background color rgba(0,0,0,0.5)
Verify the 'Close' button has text content 'X' and font size 18px

Upon receiving new messages, verify the notification badge on the 'Messages' icon becomes visible, displays count '5' with background color #dc3545 and text color #ffffff, has border radius 50% (circular shape), font size 10px, top position -5px and right position -5px relative to the 'Messages' icon, and padding of 2px 5px
On the 'Upload Document' page, verify the 'Select File' label is visible
Confirm the file input field displays placeholder text 'No file selected'
Verify the file input field text updates to '2 files selected' when 2 files are selected
Ensure the 'Upload' button is initially disabled until a file count greater than 0 is met
Check the drop zone area has 2px dashed #ccc border and padding of 30px
Verify the component has bottom margin of 20px
Open the 'Contact Us' page

Verify the embedded map iframe has source 'https://maps.google.com/?q=address', width 600px, height 450px, is loaded successfully within 2s, has a visible Google Maps watermark in the bottom right corner, initial zoom level (value) is 15, is not 'muted' if it has sound elements, has border of 1px solid #ccc, and opacity of 1.0
On the 'User List' page, verify the table displays 10 rows of user data and has 1px solid #ddd border
Confirm the table header 'Name' has font weight 600 and text 'Name'
Ensure alternate table rows have background color #f9f9f9, while others are #ffffff
Check all cells have text color #333333 and padding 8px
Confirm the 'Status' column values are 'Active' or 'Inactive' and are center-aligned
